title: Understanding Percentages
text: To determine if 40% of the members chose mystery, calculate the percentage of members who did so. Use the formula: (number of members who chose $$\frac{mystery}{total}$$ number of members)*100.

title: Calculate the Percentage
text: If $$20$$ out of $$50$$ members chose mystery, what percentage is that?

title: Compare the Calculated Percentage
text: Compare the calculated percentage with 40% to determine if the statement is true or false.
